Glendale.The Art Institute of Phoenix:
The Art Institute of Phoenix is a nonprofit institution owned and operated by Dream Center Education Holdings (DCEH), LLC, providing education in design, media arts, fashion and culinary arts.
In 1995, The Art Institute of Phoenix opened its doors and the first class of students started in January 1996. The school has grown from its original class of 45 students to more than 1200 students in fall 2008.
